abstract: China’s state-owned Chinalco is taking up its full entitlement to miner Rio Tinto’s $15.2 billion (9.13 billion pound) share issue, media reports said Tuesday.
snippet: China’s state-owned Chinalco is taking up its full entitlement to miner Rio Tinto’s $15.2 billion (9.13 billion pound) share issue, media reports said Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: China’s state-owned mining group, Chinalco, is taking up its full entitlement to preserve its stake in rival Rio Tinto, media reports said on Tuesday, with trade in the rights suggesting Chinalco is far from cutting ties with Rio.

headline.main: Chinalco Is Said to Buy Rio Tinto Share Rights
